plot: A group of Raider Scouts embark on a hunt for a legendary creature called 'the snipe.' But, as night falls, the scouts soon realize that THEY are the ones being hunted.
title: The Scout
plot_es: A group of Raider Scouts embark on a hunt for a legendary creature called 'the snipe.' But, as night falls, the scouts soon realize that THEY are the ones being hunted.
plot_en: A group of Raider Scouts embark on a hunt for a legendary creature called 'the snipe.' But, as night falls, the scouts soon realize that THEY are the ones being hunted.
